title: Zelestra aims to spend $5 billion on clean energy
description: Madrid-based Zelestra aims to build 10 GW of renewable energy capacity in India by 2030, doubling its 2026 target. The company plans to invest $5 billion, focusing on complex projects including firm and dispatchable renewable energy with storage. Recent wins include a 140 MW FDRE bid.
